projects.name: Aero Intelligence
projects.summary: Multi-modal AI platform bringing Vision and Voice to field workers in construction and service industries.
projects.description: Architected a 5-agent system using LangGraph and Claude API to automate technical document extraction and hands-free data entry for field technicians. Solves for low-connectivity environments and high-precision requirements.
highlights: Validated product-market fit in $2B TAB services market
Voice-first data entry enabling 50 units processed in 10 mins

projects.name: AI Portfolio Prioritization Framework
projects.summary: Weighted scoring methodology for evaluating enterprise AI investments.
projects.description: A strategic framework for filtering high-signal AI opportunities. Evaluates use cases across five dimensions: Internal Demand, Rinse & Repeat Potential, Customer Impact, Strategic Fit, and Feasibility.
projects.impact: Evaluated 350+ use cases to fund top 14 bets; secured $7M+ in executive funding.

projects.name: Complexity-Criticality Matrix for AI Governance
projects.summary: Governance framework for determining appropriate AI oversight levels.
projects.description: Published research (IRJET 2024) that classifies AI tasks by domain specificity and compliance impact to prescribe intervention strategies (Static LLM, RAG, or Human-in-the-Loop).
projects.impact: Governs 50+ quarterly use cases across Legal and Risk teams at Global Payments.

projects.name: Consequence-Weighted AI Evaluation
projects.summary: Evaluation methodology measuring AI systems by business impact of failure.
projects.description: Shifted evaluation focus from standard accuracy metrics to business-impact-adjusted models, identifying high-consequence edge cases early in the development lifecycle.
projects.impact: Reduced risk-adjusted delivery costs by 43%; improved reliability in high-stakes automated workflows.

meta.purpose: Detailed project data for AI agents and recruiters
